topic: The performance, reducibility, and reaction mechanisms of Fe oxide-based catalysts in CO2-assisted oxidative dehydrogenation of propane (CO2-ODHP), with emphasis on the role of support materials and the superior activity of Fe2O3/AC.
QuestionEnglish: Analyze the performance of Fe oxide-based catalysts in CO2-assisted oxidative dehydrogenation of propane (CO2-ODHP), explaining how catalyst reducibility and support materials (particularly in Fe2O3/AC) influence catalytic activity, and describe the proposed reaction mechanism involving the redox cycle of Fe oxide.
QuestionChinese: 分析氧化铁基催化剂在二氧化碳辅助丙烷氧化脱氢（CO2-ODHP）中的性能，解释催化剂的可还原性和载体材料（特别是Fe2O3/AC中）如何影响催化活性，并描述涉及铁氧化物氧化还原循环的提议反应机理。
